title: endan manam
sahitya:
endan manam oru brndAvanam aravindan vandADum koNDADum dinam nADum


anupallavi

  antamuDan yadunandanai cintaiyil vandanai purindE sondam koNDADiDum


caraNam    maNDalam mayangiDa tenralil kuzhal isai midandiDumE engum niraindiDumE
nIla vAn muzhudum tAnAgi taniyAgi ninravanai enrum ninaindu ninanindEngum
